vectorData.altText: 6. Bundles of subcortical white matter that connect regions of the same cerebral hemisphere are called _____________ fibres.
That is incorrect. Click here      to learn the answer, then come back to try again.
Thatâ€™s right!  The association fibres are bundles of subcortical white matter that connect regions within the same cerebral hemisphere.
Association fibres connect different areas within a cerebral hemisphere.
